about_the_game:
Foul is a survival game set in a post-apocalyptic environment.

Foul takes you into a world where every action matters and essential supplies are hard to come by. Explore the vast world filled with infected species that need to be dealt with.

Fight off the infected with a range of different weapons.

Engage in fierce combat with enemies found everywhere in the world. Use all kinds of melee and ranged weapons in your defence. Do you stand a chance against the infected?

Drive carelessly.

Cars are rare but valuable, allowing for quick map traversal and offering the potential to inflict significant damage.

Build and defend your base.

No place in this world is safe but it is always better to have some shelter. Place walls and other structures to ensure you don't get surprised by the infected. 

Explore a lot of various locations.

The world is filled with many notable landmarks. Pick your way of travel either by foot or by a car and then embark on a journey in order to find all of the places left behind by humans.

Collect valuable resources.

The map is filled with all kinds of supplies which can be used as materials for crafting necessary equipment and structures.

Search for water, food and other useful supplies.

Basic necessities aren't taken for granted in this world. The resources are insufficient and the search for them is constant. Could you survive with limited supplies?

name: Foul

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Quadro K2200
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: MSI GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Foul is a survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Fight off various enemies. Gather loot to survive. Explore numerous locations. Try to survive in this harsh environment for as long as you can!
